title: Talk to God with Affirmations of Faith
description: “Talk to God with Affirmations of Faith,” is a valuable resource to begin or develop your communication and relationship with God. Each scripturally-based affirmation will fortify the truth of God in your heart relative to any circumstance. Speak affirmations over your life that reflect what God says about you, what He says about your access to Him, and your access to His kingdom promises.
author: Christine Brooks-Martin
